data.name: blockUser
data.value: In general, if the abuse is occurring via in game messages, we ask that you block the person from sending you any more messages.

data.name: copyPasteConvo
data.value: Copy and paste here all conversations you had with the offer company.

data.name: copyPastePP
data.value: Copy and paste here your PayPal receipt.

data.name: exampleOfAbuse
data.value: Criminal level, <u>real life</u> death threats is an example of a type of abuse that we will review before the 24 hour period elapses.

data.name: findClauseViolated
data.value: Find the specific clause that you feel was violated. Copy and paste that clause here.

data.name: hasTwentyFourPassed
data.value:
Has 24 hours passed since the abuse occured?
We will ignore your report completely if we determine that 24 hours have not passed unless this is an extremely serious abuse as per our

data.name: h_commTrans
data.value: Transcript of your communication with the offer company

data.name: h_contactedComp
data.value: Did you contact the offer company?

data.name: li_blockedYes
data.value: Yes (Explain why this is not sufficient and why you still feel it important to report this)

data.name: li_blockedNo
data.value: No (Explain in message why not and why you are still reporting this)

data.name: li_GameThreats
data.value: Game threats (I will take your village, will attack you etc)

data.name: li_InGameComm
data.value: In game communication (in game mail, forums, etc)

data.name: li_OutsideOfGame
data.value: Outside of the game (via email, chat, facebook email/chat etc)

data.name: li_provokedYes
data.value: Yes (Read the fine print below. Explain in message why you are still reporting this)

data.name: li_RLThreats
data.value: Real-Life threats (threats to you as a person outside of the game)

data.name: li_scopeAffMe
data.value: Affects only me (I don't know if this affects others also)

data.name: li_scopeAffOthers
data.value: Affects me and I know it affects others as well

data.name: li_SevereInsults
data.value: Severe insults, profanity, foul language etc

data.name: li_timePassedNo
data.value: No (we will only review your case in case of extreme abuse)

data.name: li_transStatOther
data.value: Other (Only Completed transactions are cleared. Please explain in message box why you are still contacting us)

data.name: li_transStatPending
data.value: Pending (This transaction has not yet cleared. Please explain in message box why you are still contacting us)

data.name: li_urgEssential
data.value: Essential - I cannot play at all

data.name: li_urgImportant
data.value: Important - This is a major inconvenience

data.name: li_urgMinor
data.value: Minor - Small glitch, does not affect the game play

data.name: noMonitorAblty
data.value: We have no ability to monitor communcation mediums outside of our ingame communication and discussion board. Please contact facebook if communication took place there or take other appropriate action.

data.name: noNameInRealm
data.value: This name does not exist on the realm chosen above.

data.name: NOTE
data.value: NOTE! You must try to contact the offer company to resolve this first. If you did not, you MUST explain why in the message box below

data.name: notValidEmail
data.value: This does not appear to be a valid email address.

data.name: pasteEntireComm
data.value:
Paste here the ENTIRE communication that constitutes the abuse.
Do not edit in any shape or form.
If abuse was on our discussion board, include a link to the post as well as the post's text.
This will be used as evidence to show your entire conversation with the person.
If this is modified in some way, perhaps to hide your mistakes, the case will be thrown out and/or actions may be taken against you.

data.name: provokeByPlyr
data.value: If the abuse you are reporting was provoked by you by actions violating our

data.name: REMEMBER
data.value:
REMEMBER! Using this to report petty insults, or just to damage/have someone banned is considered a serious offence.

This is a game of CONFLICT and WAR, emotions will run high, sometimes regretable outburst will occur.

Abuse of this reporting system is considered a suspendable offence.

data.name: selectRealm
data.value: Select the realm that this issue relates to.

data.name: lbl_explainAbuse
data.value: Please be specific and as brief as possible. Explain exactly what constitues the abuse you are reporting. DO NOT simply paste a long email and expect us to read it trying to determine what went wrong. Tell us EXACTLY what is the abuse.

data.name: rfv_enterAbuserName
data.value: Enter the player names of the abuser(s) you are reporting

data.name: thanksForInquiry
data.value:
Thank you for your inquiry!

You will get an automated email response acknowledging we've received your inquiry. If you do not receive it within an hour, please submit your inquiry again and double check you provided the correct email address.

DO YOU HAVE AN ATTACHMENT YOU WOULD LIKE TO INCLUDE? Then simply respond to the confirmation email with the attachment.

We respond to your questions as soon as we can but please be patient.

If you are reporting cases of player cheating, it may take a while for us to investigate and to protect everyones privacy, we generally do not respond to such reports but take appropriate action.

data.name: toIdentify
data.value: To identify the company, go to

data.name: willNotReview
data.value: we will not review your report and reporting this may result in actions against you.

data.name: custVal_notYourName
data.value: This does not appear to be your player name

data.name: li_RealmMulti
data.value: Multiple realms or not realm specific. (Explain in message box)
